name: weroad-frontend
description: Implement a checkout process for WeRoad users to buy a Travel where: - the user can select a travel to book; - the user inputs an email and the number of seats to reserve; - the user pays the total amount to confirm the booking (FAKE payment step);

scripts.start:dev-local: cd frontend && npm i commons-nestjs-backend-weroad && ionic serve
scripts.start:dev-local-docker: cd frontend && npm i commons-nestjs-backend-weroad && cd .. && docker compose -f docker-compose-dev-local.yml --env-file ./frontend/.env up
